participant_1.name: Mark Johnson
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and discontented with life, he often feels trapped in his routine. Despite his struggles, he has a resilient side and hopes for change.
participant_1.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, she loves nature and finds joy in the simple things in life, like spending time with her horses.
participant_2.background: i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. my father is a farmer.
